statements: DELETE FROM VotingRecords WHERE official_id = 123 AND party_affiliation = 'Republican';
DELETE FROM VotingRecords WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democrat' AND official_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM public_officials WHERE district='California' AND party_affiliation='Republican';
DELETE FROM voting_records WHERE vote_date < '2022-01-01' AND vote_decision='Against' AND official_id IN (SELECT id FROM public_officials WHERE district='New York');
DELETE FROM public_officials WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' AND position = 'Senator';
DELETE FROM officials WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM voting_records WHERE official_id = 1 AND vote_result = 'Approved';
DELETE FROM committee_assignments WHERE official_id = 1 AND committee_id = 1;
DELETE FROM voting_records WHERE official_id = 3 AND vote_date < '2022-01-01';
